heading.name: Heading
heading.description: A component for displaying headings with different levels (h1-h6) and customizable styling.

prop.name: as
prop.info_tooltips: The HTML heading element to render.

prop.name: className
prop.info_tooltips: Additional CSS class names to apply to the heading element.

Preserves semantic meaning with proper HTML tags
Customizable with className and style props
